description: Dabeli is an Indian spiced potato sandwich packed with flavour, a fantastic way to use up leftover mash.
name: Dabeli Sandwich Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Place the potatoes in a large pan of boiling water and cook for 12-15 minutes, until very soft, and drain well. Tip back into the pan and mash well.

Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and add the mashed potatoes, cumin, ground coriander, turmeric, garam masala, chilli powder, green chillis and lime juice. Mix well to coat the potato with the spices and cook for 2-3 minutes. Stir in chopped coriander and remove from the heat.
Toast the buns to your liking. Fill each bun with potato mix, chopped tomatoes, onions, Bombay mix and fresh coriander.
